title: Gulttam2a2
author: Gulttam2a2
content: Altcoins include ethereum,polygon etc. Already heard of dying of altcoins. Many peoples invest in different platforms. Some people hold ethereum polygon bnb etc. But their prices don't rise much.  Are they better to hold and invest than Bitcoin? In my opinion Bitcoin is the best to hold. We have all seen the volatile Bitcoin market in the past few months. It is rumored that the price may rise further in 2024. Bitcoin never disappoints. I know some big brothers who invest or hold bitcoins never heard from them that investing in bitcoins is not good. Investing in bitcoins is better than spending money on a lover but it sounds ridiculous but it is true. So I say investing in bitcoins is better than investing in other fields. Bitcoin is the best.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Investing in bitcoin is the best because of many reasons. Bitcoin is not centralized like other coins and you will see high profit if you invest in it. Investing in altcoins too will give high yield and I will not advice you to invest all in bitcoin. Do not leave your coins in one basket. You can invest 70% of you money in bitcoin, while the remaining 30% on altcoins which are riskier to invest in than bitcoin.If you think that you want to invest on a single coin, bitcoin would be the best to go for. Know also that you may invest in altcoins and sometimes the altcoins can disappoint you.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Answer to your query is in the trading volume and market capital of BTC and ALTs. Few days back the market capital of whole crypto industry was covered by BTC like 51% or 52% market capital was covered by BTC only. Does this not emphasize the importance of BTC over ALTs. This also distinguished the interest of people in BTC over ALTs. And if we talk about the profit ratio that both BTC and ALTs could make you then this factors is not comparable because the factor that caused you huge profits doesn't relies in the coin or token you are investing it depends on your knowledge and strategies you used.For example, the whole market is lead by BTC so you could make 1000$ in BTC as profit and in ALTs too but it depends on the knowledge and experience or obviously the luck you have. other wise these two entities are just different from many other factors but profit is not the one.BTC is the king here and ALTs (alternative) means second option to select for investing in BTC. I agreed with your point and that's the reality too.

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: Things You Should Understand about Bitcoin vs Other altsBitcoin is the safest for you or anyone that's new with crypto investment.It's smarter to diversify your portfolio, but make sure that most of your investment is in Bitcoin.Ethereum and Polygon are one of the few alts that did so well for their early investors just like Bitcoin did for its early investors.Ethereum was once 20$, Polygon was once 0.003$, and Bitcoin was once 100$.The difference here is Bitcoin represents 101% decentralization and it works so far.There was a time I thought that PoW ( Proof of Work) is decentralization and I praised ETH for this, until they switched to PoS ( Proof of Stake), ETH feels more centralized.Polygon Matic is PoS too and it's centralized. Bitcoin is the only thing that makes the most sense out of all, this is one of the reasons I will forever keep having Bitcoin and the biggest bag I hold.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Investing is a personal decision and shouldn't affect your investment at all. If you think Bitcoin will have the highest return possible out of all other altcoins, you should go with Bitcoin. Historically, Ethereum has given more returns every Cycle than Bitcoin maybe because it's used more as a product rather than Gold, which Bitcoin has became? If Bitcoin can provide the fast and efficient usage, it will surely replace the Need of Ethereum in the Cryptoverse.The only advantage Bitcoin has above all other altcoins is that it's still Proof of Work while Ethereum switched to Proof of Stake.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: Gulttam2a2 on July 16, 2023, 05:59:32 AMAltcoins include ethereum,polygon etc. Already heard of dying of altcoins. Many peoples invest in different platforms. Some people hold ethereum polygon bnb etc. But their prices don't rise much.  Are they better to hold and invest than Bitcoin?  This is a personal choice, but observing older price charts and seeing how their basic characters fan out, bitcoin ticks all the boxes that the investors want as compared to any altcoin. But you may find some other coin interesting.QuoteI know some big brothers who invest or hold bitcoins never heard from them that investing in bitcoins is not good. You can tell them to track their investments vs a virtual investment in bitcoin at the same capital and then see over the next 1-2years which portfolio turns up better than the other. Of course if they dont chicken out of it. Try doing that yourself and you will see the difference. I can say this with confidence because I have been watching the market since some time now.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Interesting. Bitcoin, the first digital money, is called "digital gold" due to its scarcity and worth. Ethereum, Polygon, and BNB have their own ideals and ideas. BTC price movements have made headlines. But hey, BTC was once an altcoin (compare with usd), right? Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies do not have to fight for market share in the blockchain and crypto asset future.Ethereum's smart contracts and decentralized apps are apples and oranges compared to prior technologies. Bitcoin is popular, but dont disregard other cryptocurrencies yet. They might start as openers and take over.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: Gulttam2a2 on July 16, 2023, 05:59:32 AMSome people hold ethereum polygon bnb etc. But their prices don't rise much. On what basis do you say that ETH and BNB do not appreciate more than BTC? You and many are trying to deny that today altcoins are giving higher returns than bitcoin. You can check back during the 2021 ETH, BNB, or BTC bull season, which coin offers the best returns. I know many bitcoin maximalists will agree with you and against what I say, but I prefer reality over illusion. Bitcoin is the safest investment in the market, we won't have to worry about our investment when holding bitcoin, but to talk about the return from bitcoin, it cannot be compared with altcoins.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Diversification is key in every sector. Yes, Bitcoin is the grandfather and will be the supreme digital money for long to come. Ethereum has its own unique aspects, thus do layer 2's. Unlike some users, I wouldn't dismiss these opportunities. The opinion that they "don't rise as much" can be contradicted by looking at the charts and zooming out, it's simply not a true statement. While some want to call them shitcoins, they are actually alternatives with unique use cases. Diversifying a portion of your portfolio into prosperous solutions like these are not a bad idea instead of putting all your eggs into the BTC basket.

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: Quote from: Blitzboy on July 16, 2023, 09:12:36 AMInteresting. Bitcoin, the first digital money, is called "digital gold" due to its scarcity and worth. I can't help correcting that because it's completely wrong and it's amazing to see people aren't interested in history.It's been around for about 40 years. Have you ever heard of Liberty Reserve, E-gold, et al. Cryptographers such as David Chaum and the electronic money called ecash? E-cash was even used by some banks in Europe such as Deutsche Bank, Credit Suisse,,..Now you can say me you were talking about a currency using cryptography (a cryptocurrency) but it doesn't change anything. Bitcoin isn't the first digital currency or cryptocurrency.b-money and bit gold were probably the very first , distributed and anonymous system. Bit gold used a proof of work solution.And it was 20 or 25 years ago!As for calling Bitcoin the digital gold, that's another story but LOL

comments.body: I know quite well that bitcoin is more of potential than any of the crypto, I know very well that bitcoin is very important and during investment of Bitcoin you cannot compare the bitcoin ratio of acceleration to altcoins, its very obvious that altcoins life of increment depends on the green life of bitcoin and without bitcoin increment altcoins can not experience a bull market, while people like to invest in altcoins is that they have more profit there than investing in bitcoin

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Yes, bro, I get what you mean. The strength of Bitcoin cannot be denied. When it comes to crypto, it is far and away the best option. Ethereum, Polygon, BNB, and others are clearly pursuing their own strategies, but they lag far behind Bitcoin's. Why wouldn't they? Bitcoin is well-known, has proven itself, and carries weight.That cryptocurrencies don't provide much of a boost is something I can relate to. However, it's important to remember that not all objects develop in the same way or at the same rate. Furthermore, cost should not always be considered primary. It's all about the tech, the plan, and the crew.But who am I to dissuade you if Bitcoin is what you truly desire? Have no fear, keep HODLing!

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Bitcoin is supreme over other altcoins due to bitcoin halving which is a significant event on bitcoin price. The other altcoins depends on bitcoin for their prices and they are the duplicate of bitcoin. If you think that you don't have to invest all your funds on bitcoin, I will advise you to diversify only 20% to other altcoins,but this advice is not for newbies because altcoins are more risky and their price can pump very high and go down immediately. I don't like to invest in any other coin but bit coin because it is easy to make profit from it,when you invest in long term. Altcoins are different and one can only benefit from them by investing in short term. Bitcoin is the king of all crptocurrency.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Quote from: Gulttam2a2 on July 16, 2023, 05:59:32 AMBut their prices don't rise much. Are they better to hold and invest than Bitcoin? In my opinion Bitcoin is the best to hold.Dude you already answered your question and the sentence that I've put a bold is already a good reason why you should invest in bitcoin instead of any altcoins out there.Quote from: Gulttam2a2 on July 16, 2023, 05:59:32 AMWe have all seen the volatile Bitcoin market in the past few months. It is rumored that the price may rise further in 2024. Bitcoin never disappoints.Bitcoin has always been volatile, it's just a matter of intensity that sometimes we don't notice it especially if you're not watching the market closely like most people in the crypto space. Well, 2024 is the next halving and most of the time, during halvings, bitcoin skyrockets in prices, reaching new ATH and then slowing down so the rumor is most likely true that the price might rise further.Quote from: Gulttam2a2 on July 16, 2023, 05:59:32 AMI know some big brothers who invest or hold bitcoins never heard from them that investing in bitcoins is not good. Investing in bitcoins is better than spending money on a lover but it sounds ridiculous but it is true. So I say investing in bitcoins is better than investing in other fields. Bitcoin is the best. You've probably never heard them say that it's a bad thing about investing in bitcoin because they trusted bitcoin or that they haven't experienced any major losses in their investment or they just know better. Spending on your lover or romantic partner is an entirely different league, you don't invest everything because you can still lose even if you haven't heard anyone saying bad stuff about bitcoin, also if you don't invest in your partner/lover, there's a possibility you're letting go of the right person for you. Moral of the story: don't be a rabid fan of bitcoin, there are more important stuff out there besides making money.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: It is their decision whether in bitcoin or altcoin because they have personal principles for the investments they make, I myself bitcoin is the best while altcoins often experience much deeper disappointments but I will not oppose anyone who invests in altcoins because in that coin there is also a fairly high return if it is time.Diversification; is a way that many people do by making several percentages that they have included in their portfolio, but the average is bitcoin as the largest percentage because only this coin has a higher potential increase than others, there are also those who put in one basket that is in bitcoin alone nothing else, I think that is also a good idea considering that bitcoin is quite a lot of interest among other large investors including some institutions.
